complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Setup Project Repository and Base Architecture
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the setup of the project repository and base architecture into specific steps, including frontend and backend setup, configuration of development tools, and CI/CD pipeline creation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves setting up multiple technologies and configurations, requiring careful planning and execution.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Design Database Schema for Campaigns and Characters
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the database schema design into subtasks for each main entity (Campaigns, Characters, Players, Sessions) and include tasks for implementing relationships and validation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: While not overly complex, this task requires careful consideration of data relationships and schema design.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the user authentication system implementation into subtasks covering backend authentication, frontend forms, password management, and session handling.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Authentication systems involve multiple components and security considerations, increasing complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the campaign setup UI creation into subtasks for each major component, including form design, player invitation, character sheet upload, and image handling.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves creating multiple UI components and handling various user interactions.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the character sheet parser implementation into subtasks for PDF parsing, data extraction for different sheet formats, and manual entry form creation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Parsing various character sheet formats and extracting structured data is a complex task requiring careful handling of different scenarios.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Audio Capture and Transcription Service
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the audio capture and transcription service implementation into subtasks covering audio capture, streaming, transcription integration, and error handling.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves real-time audio processing and integration with external services, making it highly complex.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the speaker attribution system development into subtasks for voice profile creation, attribution algorithm implementation, and manual correction UI.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Speaker attribution is a complex task involving machine learning techniques and handling various edge cases.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the live play UI implementation into subtasks for each major component, including transcription display, card system, controls, and real-time updates.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves creating a complex, real-time UI with multiple interactive components.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the transcription analysis engine development into subtasks for LLM integration, prompt creation, game state tracking, and context management.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves complex natural language processing and maintaining game state, requiring sophisticated algorithms.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the text description card generator implementation into subtasks for LLM-based generation, template system creation, caching, and UI controls.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: While leveraging LLM capabilities, this task requires careful prompt engineering and output management.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the image generation system implementation into subtasks for API integration, face incorporation, prompt creation, queue system, and caching.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Generating personalized images with AI involves complex integration and handling of various scenarios.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the character tracking system implementation into subtasks for information extraction, automatic updates, manual update UI, and history tracking.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves real-time data processing and maintaining complex character states.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the campaign management system implementation into subtasks for state saving/loading, session history, export functionality, and dashboard creation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: While not overly complex, this task requires careful state management and user interface design.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the voice command system implementation into subtasks for command recognition, handler creation, natural language processing, and UI feedback.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Voice command systems require sophisticated natural language processing and integration with existing systems.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Optimize Performance and Implement Error Handling
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the performance optimization and error handling implementation into subtasks for profiling, caching, query optimization, error logging, and monitoring.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves system-wide optimizations and comprehensive error handling, requiring in-depth knowledge of the entire application.
